name: store-rollout-V2
description: Update rollout in the Windows Store
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Visit our GitHub repository for help on usage for the [rollout task](https://github.com/Microsoft/windows-dev-center-vsts-extension/blob/master/docs/usage.md##windows-store---rollout)

inputs.name: serviceEndpoint
inputs.label: Service endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Windows Partner Center endpoint configured with your credentials

inputs.name: appNameType
inputs.label: App identification method
inputs.helpMarkDown: How to determine the app to publish

inputs.name: appId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the application, found in the URL for the application's page on the Dev Center

inputs.name: appName
inputs.label: Application primary name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Primary name of the application, found at the top of the application's page on the Dev Center

inputs.name: flightNameType
inputs.label: Flight identification method
inputs.helpMarkDown: How to determine the flight to publish to

inputs.name: flightId
inputs.label: Flight name
inputs.helpMarkDown: ID of the flight as seen on the Dev Center

inputs.name: flightName
inputs.label: Flight name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the flight as seen on the Dev Center

inputs.name: rolloutAction
inputs.label: Rollout Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Will adjust the current gradual rollout percentage to the provided percentage

inputs.name: rollout
inputs.label: Rollout Value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose rollout percentage value. Valid values are (0.0 - 100.0) exclusive

inputs.name: rolloutActionThreshold
inputs.label: Execute the action only if the current rollout is less than
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Finalize Context:  Execute the action only if the current percentage is less than the provided percentage.  Else Halt.
. Halt Context:  Execute the action only if the current percentage is less than the provided percentage.  Else Finalize.
 Valid values are [0.0 - 100.0] inclusive.

inputs.name: currentPackageVersionRegex
inputs.label: Current Package Version Regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex representing current package version. Rollout will be done, only if package version in existing rollout in Dev Center matches this regex.

inputs.name: skipIfNoMatch
inputs.label: Skip if current packages do not match regex
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, the task will be skipped instead of failing when at least one package does not match the Current Package Version Regex

inputs.name: failIfNoRollout
inputs.label: Fail if rollout is not in progress
inputs.helpMarkDown: If checked, this task will fail if no in-progress rollout is found in Dev Center for given app and track.

inputs.name: logPath
inputs.label: Log Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the full path for the Store Broker log file

inputs.name: disableTelemetry
inputs.label: Disable Telemetry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether to disable the telemetry or not

OutputVariables.name: Existing_Rollout_Package_Version
OutputVariables.description: The version of the first package found in the existing submission.

OutputVariables.name: Updated_Rollout_Value
OutputVariables.description: The rollout value set by this task.
